'''Karmaphala Wood "Counter-Assault" Dining Chair''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Karmaphala Wood "Counter-Assault" Dining Chair is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Karmaphala Wood = 12
|sort = Karmaphala Wood
}}
